title: Gnoll sergeant
data:

*For a list of all gnolls, see [list of gnolls](/List_of_gnolls "List of gnolls").*

| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A commander of a pack of gnolls. Scars on its stout body give evidence of how it earned its rank. |

## Useful Info

**Gnoll sergeants** are tougher versions of regular [gnolls](/Gnoll_\(monster\) "Gnoll (monster)"), with more HP, more AC, and higher damage. They always spawn with a [polearm](/Polearm "Polearm") and medium armour, and occasionally come with a [shield](/Shield "Shield"). They appear in the early to mid-[Dungeon](/Dungeon "Dungeon"), usually accompanied by regular gnolls.

## Tips & Tricks

- The gnoll equivalent to [orc warriors](/Orc_warrior "Orc warrior"), gnoll sergeants are simple melee threats. How strong they are can vary based on their equipment. A sergeant with a [kite shield](/Kite_shield "Kite shield") and a trident of [venom](/Venom "Venom") is much stronger than a sergeant with just a [spear](/Spear "Spear").
  - Also, watch out for the equipment that other gnolls bring. A gnoll with a [throwing net](/Throwing_net "Throwing net") can make it very difficult to escape.
- As they usually appear in a group, any spells or wands which target multiple tiles are useful.

## History

- Prior to [0.27](/0.27 "0.27"), all monsters had hidden weapon penalties, so they attacked slower and weaker with any weapon. Gnoll sergeants were not nerfed between versions.
html:
Gnoll sergeant

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.30: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For a list of all gnolls, see list of gnolls.

gnoll sergeant g 
HP 17-35
HD 4
XP 86
Speed 10
AC 7
EV 7
Will 20
Attack1 11 (hit: plain)


Resistances None
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Weapons & armour
Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Natural
Size Medium
Type gnoll, gnoll
Flags Fighter
Speaks
Warm-blooded
A commander of a pack of gnolls. Scars on its stout body give evidence of how it earned its rank.

Useful Info

Gnoll sergeants are tougher versions of regular gnolls, with more HP, more AC, and higher damage. They always spawn with a polearm and medium armour, and occasionally come with a shield. They appear in the early to mid-Dungeon, usually accompanied by regular gnolls.

Tips & Tricks

  • The gnoll equivalent to orc warriors, gnoll sergeants are simple melee threats. How strong they are can vary based on their equipment. A sergeant with a kite shield and a trident of venom is much stronger than a sergeant with just a spear.
    • Also, watch out for the equipment that other gnolls bring. A gnoll with a throwing net can make it very difficult to escape.
  • As they usually appear in a group, any spells or wands which target multiple tiles are useful.

History

  • Prior to 0.27, all monsters had hidden weapon penalties, so they attacked slower and weaker with any weapon. Gnoll sergeants were not nerfed between versions.

rawPage:
{{version030}}
{{list of | gnolls}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Gnoll sergeants''' are tougher versions of regular [[gnoll (monster)|gnoll]]s, with more HP, more AC, and higher damage. They always spawn with a [[polearm]] and medium armour, and occasionally come with a [[shield]]. They appear in the early to mid-[[Dungeon]], usually accompanied by regular gnolls.

==Tips & Tricks==
*The gnoll equivalent to [[orc warrior]]s, gnoll sergeants are simple melee threats. How strong they are can vary based on their equipment. A sergeant with a [[kite shield]] and a trident of [[venom]] is much stronger than a sergeant with just a [[spear]].
**Also, watch out for the equipment that other gnolls bring. A gnoll with a [[throwing net]] can make it very difficult to escape. 
*As they usually appear in a group, any spells or wands which target multiple tiles are useful.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.27]], all monsters had hidden weapon penalties, so they attacked slower and weaker with any weapon. Gnoll sergeants were not nerfed between versions.
